1: <pb/>Ach-oq ilook' i runinq'ijiik i elik chaloq Egipto, re' noq ink'uxarik i kaxlanwi'k ma' kojooj ta ch'amb'esb'al reh.
2: Re' taqe i kajaaw i k'amal kib'eeh aj tiij, taqe i kik'uhtanik ree k'uhb'aal kisik' chi riij chi q'eeq maal nik' wach noq naa kikansam i Jesús, ruum kiyo'jik kuum i tinamit.
3: <pb/>Eh re' i aj Yahm xokik paránima i Judas, Iscariote i rukab' b'ih, re' ruuk' i jinaj keh i kab'laj chi raj tahqaneel i Jesús.
4: Re' reh xooj kuuk' i kajaaw k'amal kib'eeh aj tiij, je' wo' kuuk' i nimaq wach kikamaj chupaam i rupaat i Dios xuq'or keh nik' wach noq naa ruq'asam pan kiq'ab' i Jesús.
5: Re' keh xsuuqb'ik kik'ux, xkiq'or reh i Judas chi naa kiye'em rutumiin chi riij i xuq'or.
6: Re' Judas xuk'ul ruk'ux ruum i re', xusik' chi riij nik' naa ruye'em riib' chuwach chi naa ruq'asam i Jesús pan kiq'ab' taqe re', chi ma' keht'al i tinamit.
7: <pb/>Eh xponik i ruq'ijil i runinq'ijiik i elik chaloq Egipto, re' noq ink'uxarik i kaxlanwi'k ma' kojooj ta ch'amb'esb'al reh, re' noq inkanteesjik i rak'uun tentzun ink'uxarik ree ninq'iij re' re'.
8: Re' Jesús xutaq'aaj reje i Pedro, i Juan, je' wili xuq'or keh: <pb/>Hiy taq cha yejaa' qawa' re' xq'eq, re' naa qak'uxum reh i runinq'ijiik i elik chaloq Egipto, inki.
9: <pb/>Re' keh xkipahqaaj ree Jesús chi je' wili: <pb/>¿Aha' inawaaj i hat chi neenqayejaa' ponoq? inki taqe.
10: <pb/>Re' Jesús je' wili i xuq'or: <pb/>Noq nee taq ti okik i koq pan tinamit, ar taq neenareq jinaj i winaq rutehlaam nah tileb' i jinaj ikom chi ha'. Nee taq inatahqeej reje parupaat ar taq nee ti okik i koq ruuk'.
11: Eh je' wili taq i neenaq'or reh i ehchan paat: Re' qaj Tijineel iraaj runab'eem. ¿Aha' wilik apaat naa rub'anam wii' ruwa' ruhaa' ree xq'eq ruch'ihil taqe i raj tahqaneel reh i runinq'ijiik i elik chaloq Egipto? tiko'q taq reh.
12: Re' reh nee taq i ruk'uhtaaj aweh paruka'ch'iht i rupaat chi korjinaq chik paam. Ar taq neenayejaa' i qawa' qahaa' ree xq'eq, ki uchjik ruum i Jesús.
13: <pb/>Eh re' taqe i ki'ib' chi raj tahqaneel i Jesús xponik wo' kireq nik' wach i xq'orarik keh. Ar wo' xkiyejaa' i wi'k ha' ree xq'eq reh i runinq'ijiik i elik chaloq Egipto.
14: <pb/>Noq xureq i ru orahiil i wi'k ree xq'eq, re' Jesús xooj nah mexa chi wi'k ruch'ihil taqe i raj tahqaneel.
15: Eh je' wili i xuq'or keh i raj tahqaneel: <pb/>Re' hin ti xwaaj chi peet naa nub'anam nuwa' nuhaa' taq awuuk' ree xq'eq reh i runiq'ijiik i elik chaloq Egipto noq komajaa' kinkimik,
16: ruum re' hin xti korik taq i nuq'or aweh chi komajaa' chik naa nub'anam nuwa' nuhaa' taq awuuk' je' rukab' i wili, kore' chik naa nub'anam na' b'anroq pa runimaal rajaawriik i Dios, inki.
17: <pb/>Eh xuchop chaloq i kulk, xut'iosej ree Dios, je' wili i xuq'or keh i raj tahqaneel: <pb/>Hu', chawik'saj taq reje chawach, chawuk'ej taq aweh wilik chupaam,
18: ruum re' hin i nuq'or taq aweh chi komajaa' chik naawuk'em weh i riis uuva wili, kore' chik naawuk'em na' k'oloq iloq chi manlik i runimaal i rajaawriik i Dios, inki.
19: <pb/>Eh xuchop wo' chaloq i kaxlanwi'k, xut'iosej ree Dios, xuch'uy, eh xuyeew keh i raj tahqaneel, je' wili xuq'or keh: <pb/>Re' kaxlanwi'k wili rujalwaach i nuti'jolal q'asamaj pankimik chi k'axb'al taq aweh. Re' taq i wili naa a'nam chi q'orb'al wib'iral, inki.
20: <pb/>Eh je' wo' re' xub'an i Jesús ruuk' i kulk noq xkikohlaaj kiwa' kihaa' ree xq'eq, je' wili i xuq'or keh i raj tahqaneel: <pb/>Re' i wilik chupaam i kulk wili, rujalwaach i ak' k'uhb'aal, narojiik eloq wach ruuk' i nukik'eel naa ruchihkiik chi k'axb'al taq aweh i hat.
21: Eh re' naa ruq'asaniik weh, jinaj k'ahchi'kooj wii' chi wi'k ruuk' nah mexa yu'naak.
22: Re' hin xti korik taq i nuq'or aweh chi re' hin Ak'uunb'ees nuwii' winaq, xanaa wo' nukimiik je' rukab' i q'orooj cho chi wiij. Xa re' la', q'e' ti' i naa ruk'ulum i naa ruq'asaniik weh inki Jesús.
23: <pb/>Eh re' taqe i raj tahqaneel k'ul xkipahqaaj chikiwach chi je' wili: ¿Awach aj wo' naa ruq'asaniik reh pankimik i ruq'or? inki taqe.
24: <pb/>Re' taqe i raj tahqaneel i Jesús k'ul xkiwech'uj riij chikiwach, awach kekeh i q'e' naa ruye'ariik runimaal wach.
25: Eh re' i Jesús, je' wili i xuq'or keh: <pb/>Chi chi kixilak tokoom tinamit, re' taqe reey kow kitaaq'anik chinaah i tinamit, eh re' taqe i kajaaw tinamit atoob'laj, winaq inq'orarik keh.
26: Eh chaxilak taq i hat, awach i wilik runimaal wach, inchol ruk'isinb'isam riib'. Awach i wilik chi taaq'anik, inchol rub'anam riib' chi je' rukab' i xa aj kamanoom.
27: Eh ¿awach i wilik rajaawriik noq inaq'or taq i hat, re' inooj wih-oq chi wi'k nah méxa, oon re' ink'amwik cho ruwa'? ¿Mi ma' re', re' inooj chi wi'k nah mexa wilik runimaal wach? Raaj i hin, wilkiin taq chaxilak chi xa je' hin jino'q kamanoom.
28: <pb/>Re' taq i hat ma' nik' ta taq xi nakanaa' noq xnuk'ul taqe chaloq i ti'laj pajarik.
29: Ruum aj re', naa taq nuye'em awajaawriik i hat, je' rukab' noq xuyeew wajaawriik i waJaaw i hin.
30: Eh jinaj taq naa qa'nam wii' qawa' qahaa' taq awuuk' nah mexa chupaam i runimaal i wajaawriik. Ar taq naa atzuhniik chupaam taq aaye'aab' chuq'atariik i q'orik chikinaah i kab'laj ch'uq chi aj Israel, inki Jesús.
31: <pb/>Re' QaJaaw Jesús je' wili i xuq'or: <pb/>Simón, Simón, re' aj Yahm hat taq chik rupahqaam ree Dios, reh taq aapajariik, naa taq ruchahchuum awach, je' rukab' imb'aan reh i trigo.
32: Xa re' la' re' hin xnupahqaaj chik panutiij chi ma' naa ta ruyojiik ak'ux chi jumpech. Eh noq naa wo' chik aye'em ak'ux, naa aye'em rukowiil kik'ux taqe aahermano, inki.
33: <pb/>Re' Simón je' wili xuq'or: <pb/>Jaaw, re' hin nuchopom nuk'ux chi ojik chawiij pantz'ilom. Eh wi xatkikansaj, nee wo' nuyeew wiib' chi kimik chawiij, inki.
34: <pb/>Re' Jesús je' wili xuq'or: <pb/>Pedro, re' hin xti korik i nuq'or aweh chi chupaam aq'ab' yu'naak noq komajaa' inoq'ik imaas, oxpech naa aq'orom chi ma' aweht'al ta nuwach, inki.
35: <pb/>Eh je' wili xuq'or keh i raj tahqaneel: <pb/>Noq xat nutaq'aaj taq reje chi k'uhb'alinik, chi ma' xta taq achiim, akoxtaal, axijab', ¿mi xatkahnik taq re' chi ma' xta taq chib'ih aweh? inki. <pb/>Ma' chih taj, inki taqe.
36: <pb/>Re' Jesús je' wili i xuq'or keh: <pb/>Eh yu'naak awach i wilik ruchiim, i wilik rukoxtaal, chuk'am reje. Eh awach i ma' xta ruq'aslaj ch'ihch' chuk'ayej i ruchakéta chuloq ruq'aslaj ch'ihch'.
37: Re' hin korik i nuq'or taq aweh chi korehtaal inooj eloq wach wuuk' i tz'ihb'amaj chaloq chi je' wili: Xkojarik haa' chi kixilak i yiib' wach kina'ojb'al, inki. Ruum re' i tz'ihb'amaj chaloq wuuk' i hin naa rojiik eloq wach, inki Jesús.
38: <pb/>Re' taqe raj tahqaneel je' wili xkiq'or: <pb/>Jaaw, kiib' i q'aslaj ch'ihch' wilik quuk' ayu', inki taqe. <pb/>Qakanaa' chi je' re', inki.
39: <pb/>Chi riij i re', re' Jesús xelik reje ar je' rukab' i okrinaq wii', xooj chinaah i yuuq', olivo, eh xiooj chi riij taqe i raj tahqaneel.
40: Eh noq xi ponik chupaam i ye'aab' re' re', je' wili xuq'or keh i raj tahqaneel: <pb/>Cha a'n taq atiij, reh chi ma' nee ta taq ti q'ehb'ik pamahk, inki.
41: <pb/>Re' Jesús xujil reje riib' chikiwach je' naa najtiil inqajik wii' ab'aj noq inkutarik. Ar xuxuk'aa' qohoq riib' chub'anariik i rutiij.
42: Je' wili xuq'or: Hat waJaaw, wila' neeruyee riib' chawach, maayeew q'ab' chi neenuk'ul i ti' k'axik wili. Xa re' la', ma' ta naq neenb'aan inwaaj i hin re' ta la' naq neenb'aan inawaaj i hat, inki.
43: <pb/>Eh chupaam i jumehq' re' re', jinaj i ánjel xqajik cho pan taxaaj, xuk'uhtaaj riib' chuwach i Jesús, reh chi xye'arik rukowiil ruk'ux.
44: Eh noq k'ahchi' ruyot'om ruk'ux chi riij i ti' k'axik ach k'isiin ma' ruk'ul, xa ruyeew chik ruk'ux chi tiij. Eh re' i rutz'a'uub' xa je' chik nimaq rut'uur kik' noq inqajik wach ak'al.
45: <pb/>Eh noq xukohlaaj rutiij, xwuktik johtoq, xchalik wo' chik kuuk' i raj tahqaneel. Eh suq kiwiriik noq xk'ulik taqe rureq, ruum i rutz'irkiil kiwach.
46: Je' wili i xuq'or keh: <pb/>¿Chib'ih reet i wirik taq i na a'n? Wukteen taq, cha a'n taq atiij, reh chi ma' nee ta taq ti q'ehb'ik pamahk, inki.
47: <pb/>Eh noq kok'ahchi' chuq'orariik taqe re' i Jesús, manlik xi ponik i ma' k'isa tinamit. Re' i Judas ink'amwik kib'eeh, re' i jinaj keh i kab'laj chi raj tahqaneel. Re' reh xujil i koq riib' chutz'ub'ariik i wach i Jesús.
48: Chalik i Jesús je' wili xuq'or: <pb/>Judas, re' hat xa ruuk' i junriim chi rutz'ub'ariik i nuwach xinaq'asaj pankimik i hin Ak'uunb'ees nuwii' winaq, maje', inki.
49: <pb/>Eh noq xkilow taqe i raj tahqaneel i Jesús chib'ih i k'ahchi' ruk'ulariik, je' wili xkiq'or: <pb/>Jaaw, ¿mi naa taqe qak'ulb'ilem ruuk' q'aslaj ch'ihch'? inki taqe.
50: <pb/>Chalik i jinaj keh i raj tahqaneel i Jesús, xuyok' i rusak'aaj xikin i jinaj keh i rumoso i kajaaw i k'amal kib'eeh aj tiij.
51: Eh je' wili i xq'orarik reh ruum i Jesús: <pb/>Chakanaa' manlik i xa a'n reh, i nuchjik. <pb/>Eh re' Jesús xutz'a'j i koq i xikin i xyok'arik i xikin, eh xuk'aachrisaj.
52: Eh re' Jesús je' wili i xuq'or keh i kajaaw k'amal kib'eeh aj tiij, keh i nimaq wach kikamaj parupaat i Dios, keh i k'amal kib'eeh i aj judío, re' taqe i chopool: <pb/>¿Chihreet noq ruuk' ch'ihch', ruuk' chee' taq xat chalik chi nuchopariik? Je' cho kinchoparik ajileq' taq i na a'n weh.
53: Re' hin chu'nchel wo' naq q'iij xinwihik taq cha wuuk' chupaam i rupaat i Dios, eh ma' nik' ta taq xakapaaj nuchopariik. Re' taq i hat, re' i ora wili taq xasik' ree nuchopariik, ruum re' i q'equm k'ahchi' ruye'em i rajaawriik, inki.
54: <pb/>Eh xkichop aj re' i Jesús, xkik'am reje parupaat i kajaaw taqe k'amal kib'eeh aj tiij. Eh re' Pedro najt xam reje chi riij i Jesús.
55: Eh chi chii' i paat re' re' luk'uuj i q'aaq', eh wilik taqe i xkitzunaa' i koq kiib' chi q'axnik chi junsuut. Eh chi kixilak re', re' Pedro xutzunaa' wo' i koq riib' i reh chi q'axnik.
56: Eh noq xrilow ixoq aj poh chi tzunlik i koq i Pedro chi q'aaq', kow xutz'ehtaaj i koq, je' wili xuq'or: <pb/>Re' winaq wili ruch'ihil wo' naq i Jesús, inki.
57: <pb/>Eh re' Pedro ma' xuq'or tee korik, je' wili xuq'or: <pb/>Ixoq, re' hin ma' weht'al ta wach awach inaq'or, inki.
58: <pb/>Eh je' chik junk'aam, wilik wo' chik xi ilwik i koq wach i Pedro, je' wili i xq'orarik reh: <pb/>Re' hat, hat wo' naq haa' chi riij i Jesús maje', i nuchjik. <pb/>Ma' chih taj, jaaw ma' hin ta haa' chi riij, inki.
59: <pb/>Eh je' naa chik jinaj ora, toq' toq' xb'aan reh i Pedro ruum jinaj i winaq, je' wili i xq'orarik reh: <pb/>Re' hat korik chi hat wo' naq haa' ruuk' i Jesús, eh hat wo' aj Galilea maje', i nuchjik.
60: <pb/>Re' Pedro je' wili i xuq'or: <pb/>Jaaw, re' hin ma' weht'al ta wach awach inaq'or re' re', inki. <pb/>Eh noq xakok'ahchi' wo' chi q'orik i Pedro, xoq'ik imaas.
61: Eh re' Jesús xusutej riib' chutz'ehtjiik i Pedro, eh xk'ulik cho paruk'ux i q'orooj cho reh ruum i Jesús chi je' wili: Yu'naak noq komajaa' inoq'ik imaas, oxpech naa aq'orom chi ma' aweht'al ta nuwach, i nuchjik.
62: Eh ruum i ruti'kiil ruk'ux i Pedro, xasuq suq chik inoq'ik noq xelik reje ar.
63: <pb/>Re' taqe i winaq k'ahchi' kicha'jinik ree Jesús, xkikaqse'laaj i koq, eh xkiq'ojib'eej i koq.
64: Eh xkib'ak' chi-itz'ihy i panaq'wach, xkipahqaaj reh chi je' wili: <pb/>Chaq'ijej aj re' awach xq'ojwik aweh inki taqe reh.
65: <pb/>Eh xkib'ajib'eej i koq, xa reh reh chik taqe i ma' holohik ta laj q'orik xkiq'or i koq reh i Jesús.
66: <pb/>Eh noq xsaq'ik, re' taqe i k'amal kib'eeh i aj judío, taqe i kajaaw i k'amal kib'eeh aj tiij, taqe i kik'uhtanik ree k'uhb'aal, xkimol kiib' chi q'ataj q'orik. Eh xk'amarik reje chikiwach i Jesús. Ar xkipahqaaj reh chi je' wili:
67: <pb/>Chaq'or qeh mi re' hat i Cristo, inki taqe reh. <pb/>Re' Jesús je' wili xuq'or: <pb/>Wila' xnuq'or taq aweh chi re' hin, xama' nee ta wo' taq inanimaj.
68: Eh wila' chib'ih i xnupech'uj aweh taq i hat, xama' nee ta wo' taq inaq'or weh xama' nee ta wo' taq kinawoq'taaj.
69: Xa re' la', yu'naak johtoq chi qawach re' hin Ak'uunb'ees nuwii' winaq, naa wojiik tzuhnoq pan taxaaj parusak'aaj Ajaab'ees Dios nim rajaawriik, inki.
70: <pb/>Eh chi kunchelaal je' wili i xkiq'or reh i Jesús: ¿Mi ra'j wo' re' hat i Rak'uun i Dios? inki taqe reh. <pb/>Re' Jesús je' wili i xuq'or: <pb/>Hoo', re' i hin, je' rukab' taq i xaq'or, inki.
71: <pb/>Eh re' taqe i q'atal q'orik, je' wili xkiq'or: <pb/>Yu'naak ma' kota chik ruman chi awach neenq'orik chi wilik ru mahk, ruum xqib'iraj chik ruuk' qaxikin i chukuj q'orik xuq'or, inki taqe.
